item.title: Multi-Tenant: Database Per Tenant or Shared?
item.description: When building a multi-tenant application, one of the first decisions revolves around data management: Should you use a shared database or a database per tenant? YouTube Check out my YouTube channel, where I post all kinds of content accompanying my posts, including this video showing everything in this post. Shared Database Let’s start with the shared database… Read More »Multi-Tenant: Database Per Tenant or Shared? The post Multi-Tenant: Database Per Tenant or Shared?
